**KVM Switches Tender Announcement for Public Safety Canada**
================================================================

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**
----------------------------------------

**Solicitation Number:** 2BH2135355/A
**Procuring Entity:** Public Safety Canada
**Notification Period:** 41 days (April 27, 2023 to June 6, 2023)

**Objective:**
Public Safety Canada (PSC) is seeking proposals for the supply of KVM switches to meet their requirement for 250 Firm Deliverables, 250 Client Options, and 250 SSC ITPro Inventory Options.

**Key Requirements:**

* Deliver to Ottawa, Ontario
* Delivery Date: 60 federal government working days from contract award
* Security Requirements: N/A
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements: N/A

**Submission Information:**

* Tender Description available in English and French on [Supplier Portal](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)
* All submissions must be in either English or French
* Contact: Rashawn Griffith, Procurement Officer, at 343-549-9539 or Rashawn.Griffith@ssc-spc.gc.ca

**Contracting Entity:**

* Shared Services Canada
* 400 Cooper St, 6th floor, PO Box/CP 9808 STS T CSC, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2N1

**Amendment Information:**

* Amendment 005: [Download English](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/16CC8B75-97A2-4B12-9E05-9E69A0053A06) [Download French](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/16CC8B75-97A2-4B12-9E05-9E69A0053A06)
